app module¶

Server side Messenger app.

class app.Server(host, port, backlog=5, bufsize=1024)¶

Bases: threading.Thread

Messenger server side main class.

bufsize¶

Validator for server buffersize.

get_request(client)¶

Get request from client and add it to requests list. :param (<class ‘socket.socket’>) client: Client socket object.

host¶

Validator for server host.

init_session()¶

Non-blocking session initialization by binding and listen to socket.

port¶

Validator for server port.

run()¶

Initialize non-blocking session. Accept and handle clients. Read clients requests and write to them responses.
